entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
